sentences.sContent: Filling stations have whacked as much as a dime off their regular prices.
sentences.sContent_eng: Filling stations have whacked as much as a dime off their regular prices.
sentences.sCn: 加油站已经把正常价格降了一角银币。

phrases.pCn: 多得很；不稀罕；不值钱；容易得到的；比比皆是的
adv. 在极小的空间中；打小转弯

trans.tranOther: a coin of the US and Canada, worth one tenth of a dollar
